black.content: Given the choice, _ would be the first thing I would throw into a secret.
Usually I buff it, but you could easily enrage an angry chicken with _.
Surprisingly, _ has a lot of synergy with _.
If _ was a card, it would be a 10/10 taunt.
Wait, you put a _ in your deck? Why?
And to win this game I'm going to play a _, followed by a _, then a _!

white: Taking fatigue damage.
Blizzard screwing with already awful cards.
A wisp that actually trades well.
Jaraxxus, eredar lord of the Burning Legion.
Lorewalker Cho.
Ysera Dreamcrusher.
Clicking on the background instead of realising it's your turn.
Angry chicken.
Play faceless manipulator on a wisp.
Elite Tauren Chieftain.
The entire hand being full of banannas.
INFERNO!.
Big Game Hunter.
LEEEROY JENKINS!.
Having your enemy play a King Crush when you are at 8 hp.
Accidentally giving your opponent lethal.
Mad bomber, killing his entire side of the board.
Playing a King Crush when your opponent is at 8 hp.
That moment when your Jaraxxus gets killed by sacrificial pact.
Your opponent actually somehow managing to make your wisp MORE useless.
Letting your opponent summon Thaddius so you can mind control him.
Realising you had lethal after you end the turn.
Milhouse Manastorm not getting instantly killed by spells.
